extensionName.message: MangoFlow: Smart Copilot for Internet Surfing

extensionDescription.message: AI chat sidebar, smart assistant for browsing the web

textareaPlaceholder.message: Please enter your message and press Enter to send

settingsDomainDescription.message: This is the complete request address of the background service, for example: https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions

settingsModelDescription.message: This is the model name of the background service, for example: davinci, which needs to be obtained from the background service.

settingsApikeyDescription.message: This is the request secret key of the background service, for example: sk-xxxxxx, which needs to be obtained from the background service.

settingsApikeyError.message: Please enter a valid API Key.

summaryDescription.message: Summarize the main content of the current page.
